name: Rob'Roken
description:
🤖 PLAY 🤖

The robbery has begun! You've designed the finest team... Well no, not at all, just the opposite, let's say the robots you've programmed are still full of bugs but they'll do for this time.

You, the mastermind of the operation, will have to coordinate two other players to open the safe room in the allotted time before the arrival of the police. Make sure to guide them efficiently despite all their flaws.

IMG_GIF_GAME

ROB'ROKEN is a 3 players asymetrical game, one of them is a coordinator who play with his phone to guide the robber and the hacker. Those two players are using a controller on the TV. Your team will face different enigmas in order to unlock the safe room, communication, coordination and time management are required to successfully rob the bank.

🤖 KEY FEATURES 🤖

☛ Original 3 players asymetrical game.
☛ Communication.
☛ Time management.
☛ Cyberpunk environment.

🤖 CONTROLS 🤖 ROBBER HACKER COORDINATOR 🤖 ABOUT US 🤖

GAME DESIGN

Hugo Monmousseau
Lucas Bourdon
Arthur Joanin
Clément Navarro

PROGRAMMING
